page.title: 04Cropredy School
page.content: Children from Cropredy,Claydon,Great Bourton and Little Bourton all come to Cropredy School.The Cropredy children have to walk to school all the other children come by bus.School starts at 8.30,break is 10.15-10.35,lunch is 11.50-1.05 and school finishes at 3.00. This is going to change next term,lunch will be 11.45-12.45,break 10.10-10.40 and we will finish at 2.45.The teachers are Mr McRobie,head teacher,Mrs Dancer, deputy-head,Miss Meredith,Miss Linwood, who leaves next term and is going to get married,and Mrs Bennett,she works part-time,Mrs Upton,the secretary and Mrs King,the helper.There are 100 children in the school but next term there will only be about 80.We have an aviary,an open-air swimming pool,many animals:-ducks,rabbits,fish,gerbils and guinea pigs.We have a chequer board garden, 2 climbing frames and a fort.
